result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۖ فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
result.translation: Inyuma y’ivyo vyose, mwarirengagije isezerano ryanyu, mureka kwubahiriza ivyo mwategetswe. Iyo hataba rero impano n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah ngo mwigaye, hanyuma mukababarirwa, ni ukuri mwari kuba mu bahomvye ubuzima bwo kw’isi n’ubw’inyuma yo gupfa.
